text: Meghan Markle and Prince Harry are reportedly not getting married in December. The couple recently attended the wedding of Prince Harry ’ s best pal, Tom Inskip, in Jamaica, and according to a tabloid, the British prince came back all inspired by the feel and setting of the wedding location. He and Meghan Markle reportedly told friends that they would be getting married before Christmas in the Caribbean. Earlier this month, Prince Harry and Meghan Markle made their first public appearance as a couple at Tom Inskip and Lara Hughes - Young ’ s destination wedding in Jamaica. There, the 32 - year - old royal ’ s friends joked that he would be the next to tie the knot. And according to Vanity Fair, Prince Harry had confided to his friends that he hoped to get married soon.
